DOC.brief_summary: MicroRNAs ( miRNAs ) small endogenous RNA molecules 22-25 nucleotide length , capable post-transcriptional gene regulation . miRNAs bind target messenger RNAs ( mRNAs ) , leading cleavage suppression target mRNA translation base degree complementarity . miRNAs recently show play pivotal role diverse developmental cellular process link variety skin diseases cancer . In present study expression profile two important miRNA process enzymes Dicer Drosha actinic keratoses , basal cell carcinoma squamous cell carcinoma compare healthy skin tissue .
DOC.brief_title: Expression Levels microRNA Processing Enzymes Dicer Drosha Epithelial Skin Cancer
